p: Aflatoxins from different cultures were extracted by equal volume chloroform with vibration for 30 min and purified by 0.45 u filter. The chloroform layer containing aflatoxins was then dried at 70°C and the precipitates were finally redissolved in 50 ul chloroform for TLC analysis and the fluorescence signal of aflatoxin was analyzed and quantified with Image J suite ( http://rsbweb.nih.gov/ij/).
